text: He manusa! Tomara tomadera rabera takoya abalambana kara ebam bhaya kara se dinake, yakhana kono pita tara santanera paksa theke kichu adaya karabe na, anurupa kono santana se'o tara paksa theke adayakari habe na [1]. Niscaya allahara pratisruti satya [2]; kaje'i duniyara jibana yena tomaderake kichute'i pratarita na kare ebam se prabancaka [3] yena tomaderake kichute'i allah samparke prabancita na kare
